page.title: 15PRIORSLEE TRADING ESTATE
page.content:
We went from our School, Queenswood Primary, to Snedshill where there are two small trading estates. It belongs to the Lilleshall Steel Company. It is part of an enterprise zone which is a place where you can start your own business.
There is an ex-servicemen's club there along with a firm called "Superburgers" which makes beefburger vans. Behind a snooker club there is a place which makes ready-made concrete.
Once there was a blast furnace here which made steel. The rolling mill rolled it out to make cars and steel articles. Many people worked here until it closed down. They knocked down the building and created various small firms.
